ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | msf.x | |- X = ( Base ` M ) |
| 2 |  | msf.d | |- D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` M ) = ( TopOpen ` M ) |
| 4 | 3, 1, 2 | #P_isms2 | |- ( M e. MetSp <-> ( D e. ( Met ` X ) /\ ( TopOpen ` M ) = ( MetOpen ` D ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simplbi | |- ( M e. MetSp -> D e. ( Met ` X ) ) |
